response.original_title: I Am Delighted by Your Alchemy, Turning Everything in My Kingdom to Gold
response.overview: 'I remember I told you that the universe looks like a whole lot of something up close, but now I feel like I am orbiting around it.' I Am Delighted By Your Alchemy explores the memory of a sexual relationship, revealing what one remembers and what one is trying to forget. The film is an intimate portrait of the filmmaker's relationship to a past partner, using superimposition to queer the notion of sex and memory, as well as to blur the boundary between the filmmaker and the subject.
response.title: I Am Delighted by Your Alchemy, Turning Everything in My Kingdom to Gold
